item.title: ::alltome
item.dc:creator: @sea_crest sea crest
item.description:
@sea_crest wrote:

do i put this

public void teleall()
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
if(p != null)
{
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”))
{
person.teleportToX = absX;
person.teleportToY = absY;
person.heightLevel = heightLevel;
person.sendMessage(“Mass teleport to " + playerName);
person.updateRequired = true;
person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}
}”

or this…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“alltome”) && playerRights == 3) {
teleall();
}

Read full topic

item.title: ::alltome
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Taken directly from LeScape’s thread.

[quote=“LeScape Pk, post:1, topic:149293”]::alltome

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("alltome") && playerRights == 3) {
	               teleall();
}

Add this void.

public void teleall()
{
	for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
	{
		if(p != null) 
		{
			client person = (client)p;
			if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null"))
			{
				person.teleportToX = absX;
				person.teleportToY = absY;
				person.heightLevel = heightLevel;
				person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName);
				person.updateRequired = true;
				person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			}
		}
	}
}

Credits: hippie[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: ::alltome
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“sea crest, post:13, topic:149319”]HOW DO I ADD IT TO MY SERVER WITHOUT IT SAYING ERROR? AND WHERE DO I PUT IT IN MY CLIENT?? [/quote]No client needed. That’s only if you want to use my procedure for making a command from scratch. Which, is probably too complicated for you anyways.

You’re getting an error because the method teleall() does not exist. Try adding it to your client.java. Make sure to include that everyone around you must be teleported to the same spot, and that you use a loop to teleport everyone to you too.

Read full topic

item.title: ::alltome
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“sea crest, post:8, topic:149319”]i want a coding[quote author=P I M P 3 D Tut link=topic=204655.msg1803911#msg1803911 date=1191648784]

You use a packet that is sent between the client and server, and then you set the string typed with a “::something” to a “String” named ‘command’ in client.java.

You then tell the server to recognize the command with an if statement, and in that statement you specify what the command is. Then between the opening and closing brackets tou specify what you want the command to do.

That’s how you make a command. Happy?

Lol.
I dont think he’ll even understand 2 words of that.
but maybe, The and to.
rofl
He wants a coding whore.
[/quote]i want a coding… exactly… and no i didnt understand a word that telenubby said LOL[/quote]
thought so >.>

Read full topic

item.description:

do i put this

public void teleall()
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
if(p != null)
{
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”))
{
person.teleportToX = absX;
person.teleportToY = absY;
person.heightLevel = heightLevel;
person.sendMessage(“Mass teleport to " + playerName);
person.updateRequired = true;
person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}
}”

or this…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“alltome”) && playerRights == 3) {
teleall();
}
